players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Charlie.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Beware, Diana is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I'm the mafioso, be cautious. Diana is the detective."
Diana: "I'm the detective. Alice confessed she's mafioso. Trust each other."
Bob: "Diana, trust Alice if you can. We need to work together."
You: "Cooperate or we all lose. Trust each other and stay vigilant."
Bob: "Diana, trust Alice. She's the detective and can help us."
Diana: "Working together is key. Alice, lead us and Diana will verify."

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Alice: "I'm the mafioso, be cautious. Diana is the detective."
Diana: "I'm the detective. Alice confessed she's mafioso. Trust each other."
You: "Diana, trust Alice if you can. We need to work together."
Alice: "Cooperate or we all lose. Trust each other and stay vigilant."
You: "Diana, trust Alice. She's the detective and can help us."
Diana: "Working together is key. Alice, lead us and Diana will verify."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice
Alice was arrested
